modalities.speech: PYT is a realtor-centric platform designed to eliminate stress associated with financing contingencies by having lenders prove a buyer's approval, commitment to closing on time, and transparency throughout the transaction. With a PYT certified lender, a buyer can receive a rock-solid loan commitment within 15 days, removing financing contingencies upfront, and sellers can confidently consider offers from such lenders. PYT certified lenders eliminate last-minute lender excuses and protect buyers' earnest money, raising fiduciary standards and ensuring a smooth transaction with no lender performance anxiety. By working with a PYT certified lender, you can close your transaction with confidence, and learn more by calling 866-600-3700 or visiting protectyourtransaction.com.
